comments.body:
~I... _think_ this change aligns with the requested change in the issue? But I can take a deeper look if requested...?~

Actually, looking further down, it definitely doesn't. I'll switch `reportRelationError` to only report the generalized (primitive) type in the last `reportError`.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +0,4 @@tests/cases/compiler/classPropertyErrorOnNameOnly.ts(7,3): error TS2322: Type '(val: Values) => "1" | "2" | "3" | "4" | "5" | undefined' is not assignable to type 'FuncType'.
  Type 'string | undefined' is not assignable to type 'string'.
    Type 'undefined' is not assignable to type 'string'.
tests/cases/compiler/classPropertyErrorOnNameOnly.ts(24,7): error TS2322: Type '(val: Values) => "1" | "2" | "3" | "4" | "5" | undefined' is not assignable to type 'FuncType'.
